value.title: Calculating Stock on Hand Using DAX   Power BI Inventory Model

value.title: Compare Period Over Period Breakdown in Power BI Using the Waterfall Chart
value.excerpt: The Waterfall chart is a good visualization to show you changes on value over a sequence, The sequence can be time, or date or workflow steps, etc. There is also an ability in this chart that may not be visible to everyone, and that is the breakdown option of this chart. value.title: Dynamic Row Level Security in Power BI with Exclude and Include Rules

value.title: Dynamic Row Level Security in Power BI with NOT IN or NOT EQUAL Rule
value.excerpt: Sometimes when you apply the dynamic row-level security, you want to have the criteria as NOT EQUAL and NOT IN.
